name: No Mistakes
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Arrow keys- Move

The black balls will slow down your jump strength making it harder to get to ledges and such.

The big rock if it touches you, it will send you to the beginning of the level regardless of checkpoints. The checkpoints are only there for when you miss a jump and to get your jump speed back up to normal.

Sorry for some reason the 1st level runs very slowly :( 

can't fix it.

-Warning-

This right here is a PROTOTYPE and I will be accepting criticism, but when delivering said criticism please remember that this a prototype. I took a long break from game dev to work on my skills and I just wanted to show everyone that maybe I have improved.

Later down the line this might become a full-release game, but for now i just want to see if people like it first.
